details.description: You may need to tell DVLA if you have a heart murmur - download the correct form if you need to let them know
details.body:
You may need to tell DVLA if you have a heart murmur.

Car or motorcycle licence

You don’t need to tell DVLA. You should stop driving for at least 1 month and only start driving again when you doctor tells you that you are safe to do so. For further information please download the leaflet ‘CLE1066’.

Download ‘CLE1066 - Car or motorcycle drivers with heart conditions’ (PDF, 176K)

Bus, coach or lorry licence

You must tell DVLA. Fill in form VOCH1 and send it to DVLA. The address is on the form.

Download ‘VOCH1 - Confidential medical information questionnaire’ (PDF, 394KB)
